means: 把…嵌入，把…镶入( inlay的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The heavy dark table is inlaid with lighter wood.
sentence.Network_cn: 笨重的深色桌子上嵌有颜色较浅的木头。

sentence.Network_en: The lid of the box had been inlaid with silver.

list.abs: 镶嵌砾石-镶嵌砾石(inlaid pebble)是变形砾石之一,是由两颗大小不等的砾石彼此互相顶进(或一颗砾石压入另一颗砾石),而在砾石表面形成凹槽或压坑,并彼此结合在一.
...inlaid thermoelectric retrigerating unit 嵌装热电式制冷器inlaid ware 镶嵌制品inland river tow boat 内河拖轮
inlaid model 镶嵌模型inlaid structure 镶嵌构造inland basin 内陆盆地
inlaid gold lacquer ware 金漆镶嵌制品inlaid lacquer 镶嵌漆器inlaid snuff bottle 镶嵌鼻烟壶

entry.tran: 镶嵌的;嵌饰的;嵌花样的
entry.def: An object that is inlaid has a design on it which is made by putting materials such as wood, gold, or silver into the surface of the object.

example.ex: ...a box delicately inlaid with little triangles.
example.tran: 精巧地嵌有小三角的盒子

sentences.en: The box was inlaid with gold monograms.
sentences.cn: 这箱子镶嵌着金质字母。
